attributes.action: Introduce the royal navy to prevent illegal boat crossings
attributes.additional_details: In the interest of safety, law and order.
attributes.background: To use the British navy to prevent the illegal crossing of undocumented persons by use of boats on the English Channel.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Deploy the Royal Navy to help stop illegal immigrants entering the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998
